Pre-Game Insights: Liam Livingstone will lead an inexperienced group in three ODIs in the Caribbean.
He intends to rely on Phil Salt and Sam Curran for advice in the field.
There's a lot of untapped talent and we are going to see some of that.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordan Cox, Dan Mousley, and John Turner are poised for debuts in a 16-strong squad where six members are uncapped in ODIs.
Shimron Hetmyer is likely to make his first ODI appearance in nearly 11 months for the Windies.
Others: Liam Livingstone's father and brother will be in attendance when he skippers England for the first time in Antigua.
